title: SMC_GroupSetUnits (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GroupSetUnits
This function block allows setting conversion factors from
user units to SI units.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Executes the FB at the rising edge.

rows: The unit conversion factors to be set.

rows.Name: Done
rows.Comment: The conversion factors have been set.

rows: Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
